attributes.action: Outlaw the use of any other language other than English in all religious and educational establishments in England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I beleive that it should be illegal for any and all religious and educational groups to be allowed to preach and educate in England in any language other than English. By preaching in the native tongue of their religions in places of worship and in their educational establishments these groups are effectively precluding the indiginus population of hearing and understanding their messages. If they are not preaching and teaching anything un-toward it should not present any viable opposition.
